## Description {#details}

Legalization is decided based on an instruction&#39;s opcode, which type slot we&#39;re considering, and what the existing type is.

These aspects are gathered together for convenience in the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instraspect">InstrAspect</a> class.

Definition at line 84 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legacylegalizerinfo-h">LegacyLegalizerInfo.h</a>.
